park.name: Công viên Bách thảo
park.description: Opened in 1890. We are one of the oldest parks in Vietnam. Located near the city center, our park can easily be found if you are looking for a place to be one with nature
park.address: Hoàng Hoa Thám, Ngọc Hà, Ba Đình, Hà Nội, Việt Nam

park.name: Công viên Thủ Lệ
park.description: Opened in 1975, our park is one of the best ones in Ha Noi. We offer a wide variety of trees in a vast area for you to submerge yourself in!
park.address: Kim Mã, Ngọc Khánh, Ba Đình, Hà Nội, Việt Nam

park.name: Công Viên Kim Đồng
park.description: We have 2 branches in Ha Noi and Hue. Please visit the nearest branch to have a one of a kind experience in our park.

park.name: Thảo Cầm Viên
park.description: We are both a park and a zoo! The best of both worlds come together! Enjoy the relaxing shades of the trees while watching animals in their daily life!
park.address: 02 Nguyễn Bỉnh Khiêm, Bến Nghé, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam

park.name: Công Viên Văn Hoá Miền Tây
park.description: We offer both the close-to-nature feeling of a park and the cultural atmosphere of Southwestern Viet Nam. Just come and see for yourself!
park.address: An Thới, Ninh Kiều, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam

park.name: Công viên Ninh Kiều
park.description: Established in the 19th century. We are also a small harbor where you can have a retrospective moment about the old Southwestern Vietnam.
park.address: Hai Bà Trưng, Tân An, Ninh Kiều, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam
